Detailed Description

This configuration class specifies following menu properties:
  • Menu type (FullSize | Popup>
  • In case of Popup menus: Corner to which the popup menu should be aligned
  • In case of Popup menus: Explicit position of the popup menu
  • Close after trigger: This flag defines, whether the menu window should close, after a menu item has been triggered

enum MenuProperties::MenuType

enum MenuProperties::TitleTextType
 

TitleTextType: defines the title display properties of the menu NoTitle: No title is displayed ItemContainerText: Text of ItemContainer displayed as title - except the case that only the icons of the menu items are displayed, in this case the text of the selected item will be displayed as title. ItemText: Text of selected item displayed as title ParentItemText: Text of selected item of parent window displayed as title - only applicable for popup menus ContextDependantTitle: Text of the title is defined by the context id of the window / the FeatureItemContainer / the selected FeatureItem UndefinedTitleText: No special type of title text defined, the default behaviour will be applied, means for fullsize menus ItemContainerText and for popup menus NoTitle

Enumerator:
NoTitle 
ItemContainerText 
ItemText 
ParentItemText 
ContextDependantTitle 
UndefinedTitleText
